channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bushes growing into the road, 8th March
item.description:
Although most of the hedge on this lane leading from Winchcombe to Charlton Abbots has recently been flailed, there is a short section between the Belas Knap car park and Humblebee Cottages that still needs attention and has not been cut back for many years, especially in the area of the marker.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Corndean Lane, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight has outside number 4 Little Grebe Road working/not working intermittently, 7th March
item.description:
As stated street light often failing. Sometimes working. Has been happening for several months. Council have been contacted but say it’s not their responsibility…
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Little Grebe Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes Everest Road, 7th March
item.description:
Old part of road, which was not resurfaced previously, is rapidly deteriorating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1a Everest Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Failure to restore path and verge following cable works, 7th March
item.description:
Following City Fibre works on Hesters Way road, the kerb hasn't been restored properly. This needs addressing. Also, will the bare patches of earth be seeded?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 110 Hester's Way Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Road full of potholes, 7th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58 Horsefair Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking cars on the corner, 7th March
item.description:
Myself and the gentleman in the house first on the left in the photo. As you can see there are 3 driveways within that part of street.The second house in 22 Boleyn Close have 4 members of the family living there and all have a car each, one of there sons Jamie also now has work vehicles he brings home as well. They can park 3 cars on the driveway but don’t always, they love to park right on the corner, up on the kerb sometimes or almost in the middle. I have spoken to the gentleman that lives in 21 and due to his disability he finds it hard to get off his driveway due to their parking. It effects us as where it park makes it a lot harder for us to get off our driveway safely, I have neck and back issues that means I have a car now wear it shows me as I am reversing. Sadly I do not feel comfortable talking to them as I feel it will cause problems, I do not want that for me or the gentleman in 21. There is park at the end of the street where it would not effect any of us. I am not sure what this area is called I have always called it a turn around as that’s what most people use it for.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Boleyn Close, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: YET another Flytip, 6th March
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the PUBLIC footpath and Old Quarry off the Cleeve Common Road. The fly tip is rubbish and garden waste and has been made just 48 hours after another one had been cleared up! Please can it be cleaned up as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
